title: Friction Formula
text: Recall the friction formula: f $$=$$ \mu * N.

title: Coefficient of Friction
text: Recall the coefficient of static friction between steel and ice is $$0.04$$.

title: Use Newton's Second Law to Calculate Normal Force
text: By Newton's Second Law (F=m*a), we have $$N=m g$$. What is the normal force (in Newtons)? What is $$N=m g=65kg$$ * $$9.8$$ $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$?

title: Solve for f
text: Using the f and \mu that we found, solve for f in newtons. What is f=\mu*N=0.04*637? (keep $$2$$ digit after the decimal point)

title: Newton's Second Law
text: Use Newton's Second Law (F=m*a) to find the acceleration.

title: Find the Acceleration
text: Solve for a (in $$\frac{m}{s^2}$$, rounded to $$2$$ decimal places): $$a=\frac{F}{m}=\frac{25.48}{65}$$.
